sourcesContent:
Products

import { Component, Input } from "@angular/core"; import { Product, products } from "../products"; @Component({ selector: "app-product", templateUrl: "./product.component.html", styleUrls: ["./product.component.css"], }) export class ProductComponent { @Input() product!: Product; share() { window.alert("The product has been shared!"); } onNotify() { window.alert("You will be notified when the product goes on sale"); } }
